# Nuxt Docs Template

> A template for building documentation with Nuxt UI en Nuxt Content.

## Landing

- [Nuxt Docs Template](https://docs-template.nuxt.dev): Create stunning, fast and SEO-optimized documentation sites with Nuxt UI.

## Docs

- [Introduction](https://docs-template.nuxt.dev/getting-started): Welcome to Nuxt UI documentation template.
- [Installation](https://docs-template.nuxt.dev/getting-started/installation): Get started with Nuxt UI documentation template.
- [Usage](https://docs-template.nuxt.dev/getting-started/usage): Learn how to write and customize your documentation.
- [Markdown Syntax](https://docs-template.nuxt.dev/essentials/markdown-syntax): Text, title, and styling in standard markdown.
- [Code Blocks](https://docs-template.nuxt.dev/essentials/code-blocks): Display inline code and code blocks
- [Prose Components](https://docs-template.nuxt.dev/essentials/prose-components): Components to help you structure your content.
- [Images and Embeds](https://docs-template.nuxt.dev/essentials/images-embeds): Add image, video, and other HTML elements
